description: Internal and external works and extensions in connection with conversion to two maisonettes, including the erection of a new roof storey, the replacement of the existing two-storey part-width rear projection with a three-storey, part-width rear extension, the excavation of a portion of the rear garden and extension of the basement rear room, the replacement of existing walls to the front basement lightwell with full-height glazing and the combination and adaptation of the vaults below the front garden to form an enlarged storage space. Internal works to extended property to form a 2-bedroom maisonette in the combined basement and ground floor and a 3-bedroom maisonette in the combined 1st floor, 2nd floor and new roof storey.
decision_conditions: REASON: The design and detailing of the proposed new roof storey would be out of keeping with the original architectural character of the listed building and terrace and would therefore conflict both with the guidance contained in PPG15 and with the design principles laid down in the Islington Urban Design Guide 2006.
